ComicInfo.Title: We Gotta Go Now, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary: Hughie - or perhaps that should be "Bagpipe"- meets the original G-Men, and their mysterious benefactor John Godolkin. Secrets of the G-Mansion abound, including one that leaves our hero breathless. Frenchie and the Female begin surveillance as MM works the clues, and Butcher pursues answers from another source entirely. And in the background, unseen by either Boys or G-Men, shadowy forces prepare to make a move of their own... "We Gotta Go Now", part three!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:20:05. [CVDB144657]
ComicInfo.Characters: Airburst, Butcher, Buzz Cut, Cold Snap, Critter, Dime-Bag, Discharge, Europo, Female of the Species, Five-Oh, Flamer, Frenchman, Ground Hawk, James Stillwell, Jetlag, John Godolkin, Kessler, Mother's Milk, Nubia, Pinwheel, Puss-Puss, Stacker, Terror, The Divine, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Teams: G-Force, G-Men, G-Wiz, New York Police Department, The Boys, Vought American
ComicInfo.Locations: Godolkin Manor, New York City, New York State
